summary: Personable Customer Service Associate with floral design experience and a strong focus on customer service, inventory control, cash handling, and store operations. Proven ability to multi-task, open/close the store, and create appealing displays.
skills: Placing orders (in person and over the phone)

experience.title: Floral designer
experience.description: Designed floral arrangements for weddings and corporate events; performed prep work and maintained showroom display.

experience.title: Floral designer
experience.description: Opened and closed the store; counted cash drawers and made bank deposits. Helped customers select products that fit their needs, as well as floral designing.

experience.title: Cashier
experience.description: Handled cashier duties; helped unload trucks, stocked shelves, and carried merchandise to the floor. Marked clearance products with updated price tags.

experience.title: Manager/Floral designer
experience.description: Opened and closed the store; counted cash drawers and made bank deposits. Maintained visually appealing displays; answered customer questions and addressed problems and complaints in person and via phone. Designed floral arrangements for cooler displays and outgoing orders.
